name: Inventioneers
description: In Inventioneers you can create your own crazy, fun inventions! With the help of the Inventioneers, our tiny helpers with unique characteristics, you can invent fun, creative and often quite weird inventions. A lot of inventions are included in the game, the more you solve the more parts you receive for your own inventions!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and later Processor: CPU with SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 2.0) Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Cute little alternative to Contraption Maker.   This game I would recommend for kids of preschool age. Animations and graphics are lowely and puzzles are pretty straight and simple.
